== Description ==

Retrieve the post content for feeds.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php get_the_content_feed( $feed_type ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$feed_type|string|The type of feed.  Can be: rss, rss2, atom or rdf.|optional|null}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||string|The filtered content.}}

Since: [[Version 2.9|2.9]]
